name: Treat for Dog
description:
You're a dog, get a treat (toy) and (food) and don't lose 

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

w,a,s,d to bark in different directions

w to bark up

a to bark left

s to bark down

d to bark right

space to continue

Credit:

Programming by Me

Art by SeePotato

SFX from freesound.org
